GTgen
  • Link Stream Generation
  • View page source

Link Stream GenerationÔÉÅ

  • To generate a link-stream, the genbip package is used. See genbip/doc/build for its documentation. By considering the weighted edges as the top nodes and the timeseries values as the bottom nodes we generate a bipartite graph.

  • Given a weighted graph and a timeserie , we can now generate a link stream. Genbip takes the output of GTgen as input.

  • Link Stream Generator
  • Link Stream Anomalies
    • Getting rid of multiple edges
